infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to scan QR codes and take photos for your sports venue.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to show nearby sports venues and provide accurate venue information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to show nearby sports venues and provide accurate venue information.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app accesses your photo library to upload images for your sports venue.
